Package com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.ui.pin

Interface SecurePinPad.Callback

Enclosing class:
SecurePinPad
public static interface SecurePinPad.Callback
A callback that contains methods for managing PIN pad UI.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onKeyReceived(SecurePinPadKey key)
    Called when a key is pressed on the secure PIN pad.
    void
    onPinRuleFailed(IdCloudClientException exception)
    Called during enrollment or change PIN.
    void

    Called when usage for secure PIN pad changed.
    void
    onVerifyFailed(int retryCountRemaining)
    Called when authentication failed.

  • Method Details

    • onKeyReceived

      void onKeyReceived(@NonNull SecurePinPadKey key)
      Called when a key is pressed on the secure PIN pad.

      Developer should update the UI to reflect the changes. Examples include:
      • SecurePinPadKey.INPUT - Add a new secure character (⬤) to the text field entry.
      • SecurePinPadKey.DELETE - Remove a secure character from the text field entry.
      • SecurePinPadKey.DONE - PIN entry is validated.
      Parameters:
      key - Type of key being pressed.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • onUsageChanged

      void onUsageChanged(@NonNull SecurePinPadUsage usage)
      Called when usage for secure PIN pad changed.

      For example, during enrollment, user need to enter and confirm its PIN. At first, developer will receive SecurePinPadUsage.ENROLL_NEW. During confirmation UI, developer will receive SecurePinPadUsage.ENROLL_CONFIRM.
      Parameters:
      usage - The current usage.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • onVerifyFailed

      void onVerifyFailed(int retryCountRemaining)
      Called when authentication failed.

      Retry count limit is 5 before a IdCloudClientException whose error is IdCloudClientException.ErrorCode.USER_LOCKOUT is thrown.

      Retry count will reset upon successful PIN authentication.

      The entered PIN will be cleared on a failed authentication.

      Parameters:
      retryCountRemaining - Retry count remaining. On first authentication failed, the value of this property will be 4. On last authentication before IdCloudClientException.ErrorCode.USER_LOCKOUT will trigger, the value of this property will be 1.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • onPinRuleFailed

      void onPinRuleFailed(IdCloudClientException exception)
      Called during enrollment or change PIN.

      This callback is invoked when the inputted PIN code violates the required PIN rules.
      Parameters:
      exception - An error representing the respective PIN rule violation.
      Since:
      2.2.0
